content: Literally is so difficult to activate it isn't worth it

Have used in previous years with no issues. This year, I had trouble logging in at 2 stages. One was before the start of April, the other was after the middle of the month. At both times, the app refused to login, even when given the correct details (checked multiple times). It complained about an Invalid username or password. However, they were correct. I had to use the website for entering my activities for the latter half of April.

Love this app, I use it for school and I also have a family team. I have a home gym and myself and my parents use it all the time but im assuming that the COVID-19 pandemic has resulted in the fitness activity selection to be cut back so I can no longer add 'gym' to my tracker, I have to put it as 'other'...Why is this???
I can add people to win on the app💙
Its really good
Sometimes works, but for what it does, it's very slow. Clearly a web app, based on its slowness, reliance on the internet and the html error messages.
couldn't sign in. sign in on the website worked and gets the app one star.
do
Whatever the last update was broke it, i Cannot log in .
Can you please include rowing on the list of activities? The app can be a bit slow and sometimes crashes. I like the tracker and snapshot.
still crashing
it'd have been better if it could get connected to apps such as Samsung health, Google fit, strava etc and directly imported data from there...
replyContent: Hi Adonis Argus. Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback. We really appreciate hearing from our users about new ways we can improve Active April and the App.

content: app cant resolve hostname and doesn't work at all.
replyContent: We are sorry to hear of your frustrations with the App Melissa. We appreciate you taking the time to provide feedback. Just letting you know there was an update released on Monday which should resolve the issue you are having. If you require further support, please email us at activeapril@sport.vic.gov.au. Thanks - Erna from Premier's Active April.

content: App keeps crashing which is annoying as I can't log all my workouts.
replyContent: Hi Trent. Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We’re really sorry to hear about your bad experience. Just letting you know there was an update released on Monday which should resolve the issue you are having. If you require further support, please email us at activeapril@sport.vic.gov.au. Thanks - Erna from Premier's Active April

content: After an initial hiccup I updated the app and it's running much smoother now. I like being able to track on the go and having the benefits card on my phone is super useful. The new workouts videos this year are a nice touch too!!
Before April it was working fine, but now I try to add activity or view the fitness videos and it lags and then crashes
replyContent: Hi Iluka. Thank you for your feedback. We apologise for your frustrating experience. We are doing everything we can to make sure the App improves in speed and performance. If you require further support, please email us at activeapril@sport.vic.gov.au. Thanks again. Erna from Premier's Active April.

content: I can't access the workouts. The app keeps crashing when I try to move to a different page on the dashboard.

We are doing everything we can to make sure the App improves in speed and performance. If you require further support, please email us at activeapril@sport.vic.gov.au. Thanks again. content: excellent
replyContent: Hi Joby. Thanks for your positive review regarding the App. We hope you have enjoyed getting active this April. Thanks - Erna from Premier’s Active April.

content: it was awesole last year. i am mkre actuve abd tried new things and i wud luv luv luv to be active this winter😚😀
Great App. :)

What a rubbish app! And every year it's the same. Won't store my username 
and password, and then keeps telling me my password and username are 
incorrect, even though I use them successfully in the web site. Same issue 
as 2017.

After Easter I was really struggling to get back into a good health and fitness routine. A friend referred me to Active April through the app and it was such an easy way to start again. There was so many freebies it was hard not to take advantage and get motivated.
couldnt get past entering postcode...pretty poor given you want us to register!
replyContent: Hi Carol. We are sorry to hear about your experience. This may have been a temporary issue so please try to register again or head to the website to Register online. If you are still experiencing the same issue, please contact activeapril@sport.vic.gov.au so we can investigate further. Thanks again. Alanna from Premier's Active April

content: Slow to start.  Postcode summary not working. Reports 0 hrs for my postcode
replyContent: Hi Nick. We are sorry to hear about your experience. We have identified a bug in the Postcode tracker. This will be addressed and rectified by tomorrow. Apologies again for the inconvenience. For any more questions please contact activeapril@sport.vic.gov.au. Thanks again. Alanna from Premier's Active April

content: It won't let me log in, it says 'service unavailable'.
replyContent: Hi. We are sorry to hear about your experience. Some maintenance was completed on the app late last night. Please try to log in again today. If you are still experiencing the same issue, please contact activeapril@sport.vic.gov.au so we can investigate further. Thanks again. Alanna from Premier's Active April

content: Activation email never arrived

replyContent: Hi Ben. Thank you for your feedback. We always appreciate hearing from our users about different ways we can improve the App and overall campaign. For any more questions please contact activeapril@sport.vic.gov.au. Thanks again. Alanna from Premier's Active April.

content: Too slow to start up. What is it doing. ? Would track more time but it's tomorrow by the time the app has dtarted
replyContent: Hi. We are sorry to hear about your experience. We identified a bug in the activity tracker over the weekend that has since been rectified. A quick update of the app should allow you to track activity effectively and efficiently. For any more questions please contact activeapril@sport.vic.gov.au. Thanks again. Alanna from Premier's Active April

content: Couldn't input activities on the app.
replyContent: Hi Owen. We are sorry to hear about your experience. We identified a bug in the activity tracker over the weekend that has since been rectified. content: First day of April, cannot even enter activity dates
replyContent: Hi Chiang. Sorry to hear about your experience today. We have just issued an update to rectify this problem. If you update the App, you should be able to more easier track time in the future. Alternatively, you can select a previous date, then select today's date, to track time in your current version of the App. Thanks so much for your feedback.

content: Can't track activity, date validation does not work. Poor app
replyContent: Hi. We are sorry to hear about your experience. We have identified the problem and to rectify the issue temporarily we advise selecting a date in March and then reselecting April 1 to track your activity. For any further questions please contact activeapril@sport.vic.gov.au. Thanks again for your feedback. Alanna from Premier's Active April

content: Day 1 of Active April and I can't log my activity! I put in all the details and then tells me it needs a valid date! Even though it's correct.
replyContent: Hi Kelly. We are sorry to hear about your experience. We have identified the problem and to rectify the issue temporarily we advise selecting a date in March and then reselecting April 1 to track your activity. For any further questions please contact activeapril@sport.vic.gov.au. Thanks again for your feedback. Alanna from Premier's Active April

content: This is the worst app ever. Consistently crashes, when data is added the total does not update. I have tried to join a time on multiple occasions and each time there is an error.  When attempting to log a problem, the page takes you to an invalid address. Great initiative but sadly this app is a waste of taxpayer's money.
Activity shows as zero. No longer able to add any activity. Clicking on user icon at top right of screen crashes the app.
replyContent: Hi James. We are sorry to hear that you are having a bad experience. We identified that there were a few hours this week where data wasn’t loading. This issue has been resolved and you should now be able to view all of your activity. If you require further support, please contact activeapril@sport.vic.gov.au. Shelley from Premier's Active April.

content: Looks good but once you try to use it, it is very slow and clunky - and my phone is moto g 3rd gen with 2GB - shouldn't have these kind of problems for this type of app for my type of phone
replyContent: Hi Mark. I am sorry that you have had a bad experience. We appreciate you taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We have identified issues with performance and speed and we are looking into immediate solutions. Please contact us at activeapril@sport.vic.gov.au for further support. Thanks again Mark. Shelley from Premier's Active April.

content: Totally useless. Takes forever to load and keeps crashing. Very very frustrating.

content: Very frustrating app. Lots of text looks clickable but its not. Eg the Red Activity Snapshot box. Maybe it will improve when it's live and useable. Also no Rowing option.
replyContent: Hi Justine. We are sorry to hear of your frustrations. We are always looking to improve to ensure participants have the best experience. We have added a ‘Water Sport’ option when adding activity to cover sports such as rowing. If you require additional support, please contact activeapril@sport.vic.gov.au. Shelley from Premier's Active April.
